app.title: MediTime
app.subtitle: Manage, track and share your medical treatments with ease.
features.desc1: Schedule your doses, receive reminders, and stay worry-free.
features.desc2: Allow loved ones or caregivers to support you every day.
features.desc3: Your data is protected with reliable technologies like Supabase and Firebase.
why.title: Why choose MediTime?
why.desc: Because health leaves no room for improvisation. MediTime offers you a clear, intuitive, and secure solution to manage your treatments and those of your loved ones, day after day.
testimonials.title: They trust us
testimonials.quote: I still fill my mom’s pillbox every week, but with MediTime, it’s become so much easier. I can see her whole treatment at a glance, I get reminders, and so does she. We feel much more at ease.
testimonials.author: Andrée C. and her grandchildren
mobile.title: Available on your phone
mobile.desc: MediTime works like a mobile app. Add it to your home screen for quick access.
mobile.ios: On iPhone, open MediTime in Safari, tap then "Add to Home Screen".
mobile.android: On Android, a message "Add to Home Screen" will automatically appear at the bottom of the browser. Tap it to install MediTime.
mobile.other: MediTime is also accessible on desktop or tablet.
cta.title: Start today
cta.desc: Create your free account and simplify the medical management of the whole family.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy – MediTime
privacy.section1.title: 1. Who are we?
privacy.section1.content: MediTime is a web application designed to facilitate the management of medical treatments. It allows users to create personalized calendars, receive reminders, and share schedules with loved ones or healthcare professionals. The project is developed personally by Matis Gillet (aka mtx_26), with no commercial purpose.
privacy.section2.title: 2. What data is collected?
privacy.section2.personal_data.title: Personal data
privacy.section2.personal_data.email: Email, name, photo: via authentication (Supabase Auth).
privacy.section2.personal_data.uid: Unique ID: automatically generated for each user.
privacy.section2.treatment_data.title: Treatment-related data
privacy.section2.treatment_data.medicine: Medicine names, dosages, frequencies, intake times.
privacy.section2.treatment_data.history: History of calendar modifications and sharing.
privacy.section2.tech_data.title: Technical data
privacy.section2.tech_data.device: Device and browser information (for debugging and anonymized statistics).
privacy.section3.title: 3. How is this data used?
privacy.section3.sync: To display and synchronize treatment calendars.
privacy.section3.reminders: To send reminders or alerts if the user has enabled notifications.
privacy.section3.sharing: To enable secure sharing with other users.
privacy.section3.stability: To improve the stability and security of the application.
privacy.section3.no_ads: No data is sold, shared, or used for advertising purposes.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Where is the data stored?
privacy.section4.firebase: Firebase (only for push notifications and anonymous statistics).
privacy.section4.location: Databases are located in the European Union or in GDPR-compliant regions.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Sharing and security
privacy.section5.encryption: All calendar sharing is encrypted and controlled by the user.
privacy.section5.auth: Data access is protected by authentication.
privacy.section5.passwords: Login credentials are never visible or stored in plain text.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Your rights
privacy.section6.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you may at any time:
privacy.section7.title: 7. Contact
link_already_exists: A link already exists for this calendar.
link_will_be_generated: A link will be generated for
terms.title: Terms of Use – MediTime
terms.section1.title: 1. Purpose
terms.section1.p1: These conditions define how the MediTime application may be used, developed personally by Matis Gillet (aka mtx_26), with no profit motive.
terms.section1.p2: By using the app, you fully accept these conditions.
terms.section2.title: 2. Features
terms.section2.list.item3: Share calendars with other people (links or accounts).
terms.section2.disclaimer: The app is provided "as is" with no guarantee of continuous availability or medical accuracy.
terms.section3.title: 3. Access and registration
terms.section3.list.item2: Accepting these terms and the privacy policy.
terms.section3.conclusion: Each user is responsible for the confidentiality of their account and data.
terms.section4.title: 4. Intellectual property
terms.section4.content: Unless otherwise stated, the source code, design and content of MediTime are owned by Matis Gillet. Any reproduction, distribution or modification without authorization is prohibited.
terms.section5.title: 5. Responsibilities
terms.section5.p1: The app does not replace medical advice. The user remains solely responsible for how the displayed information is used.
terms.section5.p2: MediTime or its developer cannot be held liable for:
terms.section5.list.item3: Loss or disclosure of data following insecure usage.
terms.section6.title: 6. Account deletion
terms.section6.list.item1: Delete your account and data via an email request;
terms.section6.conclusion: Deletion is permanent and cannot be undone.
terms.section7.title: 7. Changes
terms.section7.content: These terms may be modified at any time. You will be informed of major changes via the app or by email.
terms.section8.title: 8. Contact
terms.section8.intro: For any question about these conditions:
